Text: Been waiting for the two episodes you've uploaded for a while now. Anyone confirm there good?

Yes this is the real thing. Unfortunately it still seems to have serious audio sync problems, and for it's size has terrible audio and video quality (to me). Thanks anyway for uploading this, movieboy.

You're welcome polarbearing and yes it's still is not perfect.  I didn't change the size as I try not to create any more degradation than there already is.

The original was in MKV format which is probably has the least malleability than any other to work with, but I could not leave it as it was originally (off by a full 30 seconds) and there will always be some degradation any edit.

However, soon after my post, I found this:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7343136

I don't know if it's better, but it's worth a shot.

~Movieboy
